name: Classic Solitaire Card
description:
This is a good gift for solitaire fans. Classic Solitaire Card is very simple to play. Tap, drag and drop to move the card. It's same as the pc solitaire.

Features:
- Daily Challenge
- Vegas mode
- 2 card face styles
- 8 card back styles
- 10 table selection
- Unlimited undo, for free
